data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Thái Nguyên, Vietnam and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Thái Nguyên, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Thái Nguyên to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, convict the 24,644 believers in Thái Nguyên to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Thái Nguyên, Vietnam.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Tai Nua, Chinese Shan people.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,139,400 people living in the state of Thái Nguyên.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Thái Nguyên, Vietnam.

data.section_summary:
the state of Thái Nguyên, Vietnam has a population of 1,139,400.

We estimate Thái Nguyên has 24,644 people who might know Jesus, 91,394 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,023,362 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Thái Nguyên, Vietnam a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Thái Nguyên
location.cities_list: Thái Nguyên, Đu, Hương Sơn, Chùa Hang, Chợ Chu
